<doc> PASSWORD -- Password encryption

== Description ==

[[password|PASSWORD]] encrypts passwords as required by the Hop authentication 
mechanism.

== Services ==

PASSWORD defines two services:

  - ++[[password]]++: This is the main entry point of the 
 PASSWORD weblet. It presents the user with a form for typing in passwords.
  - ++password/encrypt++: This service encrypts a password. It takes two
 arguments: 
   * ++user++, the user name
   * ++password++, his unencrypted password.

</doc>
